item.description:
The polls have spoken...it's time to reserve a lane at Kings! We'll play from 3:00 - 5:00 PM

Who's up for knocking down some pins? Who's up for knocking back some drinks? Do one or the other or both...either way we'd love to see you! Come out to meet old friends and to make new ones.

Often, members make plans to continue the evening at other venues after the pre-party, but if you have other plans for Saturday night that's fine too. This time frame gives everyone the opportunity to run home to freshen up for a big night out, if you so choose. Therefore, there's nothing to lose, right?!?

NOTE: If you plan to bowl, please arrive promptly at 3:00 PM.
If you are only coming to socialize, drop in anytime between 3:00 - 5:00 PM

The following items are not allowed at Kings:
Work style boots
No large Chains/Sunglasses
Bandanas/Doo Rags
Backpacks
No over-sized shirts
No sleeveless Shirts
No outside food or beverage is allowed
Please note, Kings staff reserve the right to search bags at any timeâ€¦
item.how_to_find_us: Reservation will be made for a lane under ALWAYS LEARNING
item.name: Pre-Party: Bowling at Kings
